name: Metal Robot
description:
For now it's prototype of a game and I'll be develop it.

It's a game where the player is a metal robot and you have to find things you can take to have points but on a board there are many sharp things you can push off. How can you do it? Robot have a red square and blue square. Red square push off the blue sharp things and blue square can push off red things. But everywhere will be enemies so it'll not be so easy for you to finnish a level.
